Package org.valid4j

Simple validation library

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssertivePolicy
    Policy for checking contract conditions.
    ExceptionFactory<T extends Exception>
    Factory that constructs a recoverable exception given a string argument.
    UnreachablePolicy
    Policy for handling unreachable code
    ViolationPolicy
    Policy for handling contract violations
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assertive
    Entry point for the global assertive policy.
    CheckAssertivePolicy
    An implementation of the assertive policy that checks the given conditions for violations.
    EnsureViolationPolicy
    Policy for handling post-conditions by throwing a contract violation.
    ExceptionFactories  
    ExceptionFactories.NoArgumentFactory<T extends Exception>  
    ExceptionFactories.OneArgumentFactory<T extends Exception>  
    Message  
    MessageBuilder
    Class that builds a message upon invocation of toString().
    NeverGetHerePolicy
    Policy for handling unreachable code by throwing an unrecoverable exception.
    RequireViolationPolicy
    Policy for handling pre-conditions by throwing a contract violation.
    Validation
    Entry point for validation methods.
    Validator<T extends Exception>  

Package org.valid4j Description

Simple validation library
See Also:
Assertive, Validation
